name: MubarakWay - Islamic Learning Platform
description: Full-stack Islamic learning platform with Quran, Prayer, Library, and AI Assistant. Built with React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Telegram WebApp integration.

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB connection string from MongoDB Atlas

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key for JWT token generation (min 32 characters)

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: Anthropic API key for Claude AI features

VITE_QURAN_API_TOKEN.description: E-Replika Quran API token (optional - for fallback)

ADMIN_TELEGRAM_IDS.description: Comma-separated list of Telegram User IDs with admin access
